text: Bagdad is a 1949 American fantasy adventure movie directed by Charles Lamont and starring Maureen O'Hara, Paul Hubschmid, Vincent Price, Jeff Corey, John Sutton, Frank Puglia. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:1949 adventure movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Lamont Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies set in Iraq
title: Bagdad (movie)
